bug.author: vishalbollu
bug.summary: Add Cortex Namespace to python modules
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The python modules in pkg/workloads are currently don't have Cortex namespace in them. <denchmark-h:h3>Motivation</denchmark-h>
Namespacing Cortex modules will prevent collisions with custom Python Packages that users may upload.
